resources.string: BumpBid is a overbooking management system under the TravelFlex scheme. As a TravelFlex passenger, you are given the opportunity to exchange your seat for compensation (cash or seat upgrade) on a first come first serve basis. Click next to find out the current offer and options available.
Option 1: Receive compensation as a cash voucher
Option 2: Receive compensation as a upgrade to Business Class for the rescheduled flight
